content.html: Congratulations to all of the emerging talent in the UK Open Technology ecosystem who have made our second New Year Honours List #openukgennext openuk.uk/2022HonoursList Wishing everyone a Happy New Year and inviting you to start 2022 by celebrating this talent #openukhonouree
content.value:
Congratulations to all of the emerging talent in the UK Open Technology ecosystem who have made our second New Year Honours List #openukgennext openuk.uk/2022HonoursList 
Wishing everyone a Happy New Year and inviting you to start 2022 by celebrating this talent #openukhonouree
